subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Michael Baze, 24, who rode Nehro, the Kentucky Derby runner-up, to his only career victory, was found dead in his vehicle in the stable area at Churchill Downs in Louisville, Ky.
snippet: Michael Baze, 24, who rode Nehro, the Kentucky Derby runner-up, to his only career victory, was found dead in his vehicle in the stable area at Churchill Downs in Louisville, Ky.
